description: Apache HTTP Server 2.4.25 running on Debian Linux, exposing service information and version details through HTTP headers. Version is outdated (released 2016) with known vulnerabilities.
notes: Apache 2.4.25 from 2016 is outdated (current stable is 2.4.x from 2024). Version disclosure in headers aids attacker reconnaissance. Multiple known CVEs exist for this version. PHP 5.6.40 version also exposed - extremely outdated (end-of-life January 2019) with numerous known vulnerabilities including RCE possibilities."
